/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their white and gray facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the architectural style of the city. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
